p: The research material was strains of Fusarium graminearum isolated on PDA medium from infected cereals. The strains were identified on the basis of morphological characteristics [ 12, 30, 31]. Commercial essential oils (produced by ETJA, ElblÄ…g, Poland), such as geranium ( Pelargonium graveolens), rosewood ( Aniba Rosaeodora), rosemary ( Rosmarinus officinalis) and lemon ( Citrus limonum), which are widely available in the course of trade, were tested.
